info.title: UNMS API
info.description:
You can authorize calls with x-auth-token by clicking the button on the right.
    You can get this token on endpoint /user/login

tags.name: Users
tags.description: Manage UNMS users and their profiles.

tags.name: Server
tags.description: UNMS settings with SMTP configuration, SSL and backups configuration.

tags.name: Sites
tags.description: Manage sites and clients (former endpoints), their pictures and network structure.

tags.name: Devices
tags.description: Configuration and monitoring for all devices.

tags.name: Tasks
tags.description: View, start or cancel UNMS background tasks, for example firmware upgrade.

tags.name: Discovery
tags.description: Scan for devices and connect them to UNMS.

tags.name: Traffic
tags.description: Devices and clients traffic statistics generated thanks to NetFlow.

get.summary: List of all devices in UNMS.

200.description: status of updated gateway with data

get.summary: List of all network outages for last month.
List of sites in UNMS. Only some combinations of query parameters are valid.

parameters.description: Return only sites with these IDs.
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: Return only sites that contain a device with this IP address.
parameters.name: ip

parameters.description: Return site containing device with this ID.
parameters.name: deviceId

parameters.description: If true, returns only sites that are bound with CRM. If false, returns only sites that are not bound with CRM. Can be used only with "type" parameter.
parameters.name: ucrm

parameters.description: Include CRM client and service details. Can be used with any other parameter.
parameters.name: ucrmDetails

post.summary: Start FW upgrade task for a group of devices.

parameters.description: Whether to include internal access groups.
parameters.name: withInternal

parameters.description: Whether to include site and user counts.
parameters.name: withOverview

get.summary: Get data link based on its ID.

delete.summary: Delete data link based on its ID.

get.summary: Return a list of devices IPs which are in UNMS monitored IP ranges.

parameters.description: Return only IPs which are blocked.
parameters.name: suspended

parameters.description: Return only IPs for this UNMS site.
parameters.name: siteId

parameters.description: Return only IPs for this UCRM service.
parameters.name: ucrmId

get.summary: Return a list of all devices MAC address (except for ONUs).
Returns list of all UI devices model info.
Get unknown client devices (based on detected network traffic) ordered by total traffic.

parameters.description: Get only devices that produced at least this amount of traffic (in bytes).
parameters.name: minTraffic

get.summary: Get current scan status (payload is WIP).
Get devices registered for installation ordered by current user's location.

parameters.description: If specified, get only devices registered by given users.
parameters.name: userId

get.summary: Get IP address of the UNMS server, resolve hostname if necessary.
List of items in UNMS that changed since given timestamp.
Return UNMS key for UNMS server.
Get news from UNMS feed for user.
Get server time of the UNMS server.
Various badge-count like values, e.g. unread logs count.
Search sites based on name, address, MAC address or IP address.

parameters.description: Text to search for in site.
parameters.name: query

parameters.description: Order sites by distance from this latitude.
parameters.name: latitude

parameters.description: Order sites by distance from this longitude.
parameters.name: longitude

get.summary: Get traffic from each site between two points in time.

parameters.description: Timestamp of the beginning of the interval in milliseconds
parameters.name: from

parameters.description: Timestamp of the end of the interval in milliseconds
parameters.name: to

parameters.description: Include CRM client and service details.
parameters.name: ucrmDetails

delete.summary: Delete site. It's possible to call only on empty site.

get.summary: Return number of tasks in progress state.
Returns a mass upgrade task inner task items.
Gets new information for two factor authentication.

put.summary: Sets two factor authentication for user.

get.summary: Get elevation data between two points.
Get data link based on device ID.
List of data links based siteId
List of all access points and their connection profiles.
Get info on device by mac address.
Return mac table of device. [EdgeSwitch, EdgeRouter, AirMax]
Fetch mac table from device and save to unms. [EdgeSwitch, EdgeRouter, AirMax, UNMSRouter, UNMSSwitch]
Get subnets that are ignored by traffic collection.

post.summary: Set subnets that are ignored by traffic collection.

get.summary: Get subnets that are relevant for traffic collection.

post.summary: Set subnets that are relevant for traffic collection.

get.summary: Get upload and download between site and its parent site

parameters.description: Interval for which to fetch traffic stats
parameters.name: interval

get.summary: Get site traffic between two points in time.

parameters.description: Timestamp of the beginning of the interval in milliseconds
parameters.name: from

parameters.description: Timestamp of the end of the interval in milliseconds
parameters.name: to

get.summary: Return all site images sorted by image order.

post.summary: Upload new image and create image thumbnail.

get.summary: List of all clients belonging to the given site.
Get information on device's flow-accounting status.
Get an Onu's connected devices MAC addressees.
Get information on device's flow-accounting status.
Get temporary download token for this backup.
Get site traffic for specified interval up to now.

parameters.description: Interval for which to fetch traffic stats
parameters.name: interval

get.summary: Get site total upload and download for specified interval up to now.

parameters.description: Interval for which to fetch traffic stats
parameters.name: interval

get.summary:
Get AirCube network config. This API endpoint is DEPRECATED.
      Please refer to '/nms/api/v2.1/devices/aircubes/{id}/network' instead.

put.summary:
Update AirCube network config. This API endpoint is DEPRECATED.
      Please refer to '/nms/api/v2.1/devices/aircubes/{id}/network' instead.

get.summary:
Get AirCube wireless config. This API endpoint is DEPRECATED.
        Please refer to '/nms/api/v2.1/devices/aircubes/{id}/wireless' instead.

put.summary:
Update AirCube wireless config. This API endpoint is DEPRECATED.
      Please refer to '/nms/api/v2.1/devices/aircubes/{id}/wireless' instead.

get.summary:
Get AirCube system config. This API endpoint is DEPRECATED.
      Please refer to '/nms/api/v2.1/devices/aircubes/{id}/system' instead.

put.summary:
Update AirCube system settings. This API endpoint is DEPRECATED.
      Please refer to '/nms/api/v2.1/devices/aircubes/{id}/system' instead.

get.summary: Return list of interfaces available to create data link.

post.summary: Authorize first device in cloud setup.
Create and download a new multi device backup.
Complex devices import which internally use discovery and creates blackboxes for unreachable and non-UBNT devices.
Reset devices specific AES keys to universal AES keys.
Returns modulation coverage in monitored area.
Delete sites. It's possible to call only on empty sites.
Import sites/endpoints and their devices relations.

parameters.description:
If true it will create all sites and clients from payload.
      In case of duplicate names or ucrmId it will not update them but create duplicates.
parameters.name: forceCreate

delete.summary: Import sites/endpoints and their devices relations.

post.summary: Execute speed test between two devices.
Check that the session token and cookie are valid.
Updates authenticated last release notes seen version.
Returns AirMax stations for AirMax access points.
Find and connect other device using IP address
Find and connect UBNT device using IP and provided credentials.
Disable maintenance mode on one or more devices.
Enable maintenance mode on one or more devices.
Upgrade device FW to the latest FW version in UNMS. It's possible to track upgrade process via /tasks API.
Authorize device. [Deprecated in favor of route POST /nms/api/v2.1/devices/authorize]
Reset device specific AES key to universal AES key.
Set update of device to realtime profile.
Start connect process for discovered other devices.
Start connect process for discovered UBNT devices.
Add chat message to the installation.
Test mail server settings by sending email.
Import UNMS sites to UCRM services relations description.
Generate new password for devices. Returns status.
Set update of ONU to realtime profile.
Delete ONU GPON password and set status to blocked.
Update devices UNMS Key hostname and port.
Perform device authorization before opening a devices UI.
Set all blog posts as read.
Mark the questionnaire as visited. It will pop up later if it is not submitted.
Unbind UCRM services and UNMS site.
Bind UCRM services and UNMS site.

Generate new password for device. This endpoint is DEPRECATED.
      Please refer to '/nms/api/v2.1/vault/credentials/regenerate' instead.
Update device configuration from backup file.
Rotate the image 90 degrees to left.
Rotate the image 90 degrees to right.
Checks if the UNMS Key is reachable from the device.
Checks if the hostname and port is reachable from the device.

200.description: status of updated gateway with data

put.summary: Disable two factor authorization for user.
Add or change access to single site.

delete.summary: Stop speed test between two devices.
Delete unknown client devices (based on detected network traffic).

origin.description: Generated by UNMS or manually added

enum: Saint Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunh
South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

displayName.description: UNMS device alias or real name.

ip.description: Custom IP address in IPv4 or IPv6 format.

modelName.description: Full names, for example UFiber OLT.

customIpAddress.description: Custom IP address in IPv4 or IPv6 format.

wirelessActiveInterfaceIds.description: Main active radios currently used to send/receive traffic.

canUpgrade.description: TRUE if device can be upgraded.

frequency.description: Nullable prop; current frequency (only for airmax devices).

isLocateRunning.description: TRUE if device is in location mode.

lastSeen.description: Last seen timestamp in ISO format.

runningOnBattery.description: TRUE if device is running on battery

signal.description: Nullable prop; current signal level (only for airmax devices), for example -55 dBm.

stationsCount.description: Count of stations (only for airmax and aircube).

displayName.description: Computed display name from name and description

address.description: Custom IP address in IPv4 or IPv6 format.

port.description: Properties specific for ports on ES and TS devices.

frequency.description: Frequency in MHz, on which radio is listening.

channelWidth.description: Channel width in MHz radio is operating on.

displayName.description: UNMS device alias or real name.

ip.description: Custom IP address in IPv4 or IPv6 format.

modelName.description: Full names, for example UFiber OLT.

rxChain.description: Wireless signal level in dBm for each antenna chain.

txChain.description: Wireless signal level in dBm for each antenna chain.

ipAddress.description: Custom IP address in IPv4 or IPv6 format.

interfaceId.description: Interface name, where the station is connected.

ipAddress.description: Custom IP address in IPv4 or IPv6 format.

suspendAllowedIps.description: Array of IP addresses in IPv4 format that are allowed for suspended clients.

interfaceId.description: Interface name, for example eth0 which handles connectivity to WAN network. If null, speed limits are applied on all interfaces.

downloadSpeed.description: Max speed given in kbps. If 0 value is configured then ingress traffic for this tariff is blocked. If null, no maximum speed is assumed.

uploadSpeed.description: Max speed given in kbps. If 0 value is configured then egress traffic for this tariff is blocked. If null, no maximum speed is assumed.

clientsUploadSpeedSum.description: Sum of all client sites traffic shaping upload values in kbps.

clientsDownloadSpeedSum.description: Sum of all client sites traffic shaping download values in kbps.

enabled.description: Enable configuration for QoS queue for IPs without any specific queue. The main purpose of this configuration is to block new devices without any active queue. If null, traffic not belonging to any queue is not limited.

ipAddress.description: Device IP address in CIDR format

netflowEnabled.description: Set to true to enable NetFlow.

netflowAlerts.description: Set to true to enable alerts.

qosEnabled.description: Set to true to enable traffic shaping.

suspend.description: Set to true to enable suspend.

forceOverwrite.description: Set to true to force write new NetFlow settings to device over current device's settings.

lastTrafficSeen.description: Date and time of last traffic in ISO format

displayName.description: UNMS device alias or real name.

ip.description: Custom IP address in IPv4 or IPv6 format.

modelName.description: Full names, for example UFiber OLT.

deviceMetadata.description: Log respective device meta data object.

timestamp.description: Date and time of the log creation.

updated.description: Time when the site was last updated.

suspended.description: Whether access to internet is disabled for this site or not.

phone.description: Phone number of the contact person.

updated.description: Time when the site was last updated.

suspended.description: Whether access to internet is disabled for this site or not.

ipAddresses.description: Devices IPs assigned to a site/client site.

deviceCount.description: Number of devices in this site.

ucrmId.description: ID of UCRM client bound with this site. Null if no UCRM client is bound to this site.

Model 8.description: Users who will receive notifications. Notification type must be set to custom.

type.description: What notification system is used by this site.

enabled.description: Set to TRUE if optional Traffic Shaping queue are activated.

propagation.description:
Whether or not set Traffic Shaping on Client devices like, CPEs and ONUs.
      Enabling this will lower your traffic in local network.

downloadBurstSize.description: Amount of bytes that can be sent at downloadSpeed in excess of the guaranteed rate.

uploadBurstSize.description: Amount of bytes that can be sent at uploadSpeed in excess of the guaranteed rate.

aggregation.description:
Number indicating how many times the guaranteed rate is less than the maximum allowed bandwidth.
      Null for auto calculation by UNMS.

activeFrom.description: Time when the service was activated.

tariffId.description: ID of the tariff (service plan) used for this service.

userId.description: Id of the user this token represents.

username.description: User name of the user this token represents.

id.description: Token ID, not the token itself.

createdAt.description: Time when this token was created.

lastUsed.description: Time when this token was last used. If null then it has not been used yet.

expiresAt.description: Time when this token will expire unless it is renewed. If null than it will never expire.

maxExpiresAt.description: Latest time when the token will expire. If null then it will never expire.

userId.description: Id of the user this token represents. Null if the token is not bound to any user.

transient.description: If true then the token will be deleted when server restarts.

currentSession.description: If true than this token was used in this request.

updated.description: Last time the location was updated.

role.description: Role of this user in UNMS. 'anonymous' if user is only allowed to access CRM.

sessionTimeout.description: Session expiration in milliseconds, max 30 days.

keepMeSignedIn.description: Whether session should be cleared when browser window is closed.

lastNewsSeenDate.description: Last news check time in ISO format.

lastReleaseNotesSeen.description: Last seen version of release notes.

ucrmId.description: ID of UCRM user that is bound with this user.

ucrmRole.description: Role of this user in UCRM. 'null' if user is not allowed to access UCRM.

homeScreen.description: Where should the user be redirected after login.

enabled.description: Whether the user can log in or not.

updated.description: Last time the user was updated.

isReadOnly.description: If true, access to site is read-only. If false, access to site is read-write.

all.description: Number of sites with read access.

readOnly.description: Number of sites with read-only access.

readWrite.description: Number of sites with read-write access.

all.description: Number of client sites with read access.

readOnly.description: Number of client sites with read-only access.

readWrite.description: Number of client sites with read-write access.

all.description: Number of users using this access group.

isAuto.description: If true the access group is automatically generated and cannot be edited.

isInternal.description: If true the access group is internal. User should not be able to select it

ipAddress.description: Custom IP address in IPv4 or IPv6 format.

address.description: IP address of the unknown device.

firstSeen.description: First time this IP address was seen as a ISO 8601.

lastSeen.description: Last time this IP address was seen as a ISO 8601.

upload.description: Total number of bytes uploaded by this IP address.

download.description: Total number of bytes downloaded by this IP address.

ipAddress.description: Custom IP address in IPv4 or IPv6 format.

id.description: Id of the user who registered the device.

installation.description: Installation this device is part of. Null if not part of an installation yet.

id.description: Id of the installation this device is part of.

data.description: Any device specific data that are required during installation.

distance.description: Distance in meters from requested location.

updated.description: Last time the installation device was updated.

created.description: Last time the installation device was updated.

id.description: Id of the author of the message.

created.description: Time when the chat message was created.
Time when the installation was created.

updated.description: Time when the installation was updated.

finished.description: Time when the installation was finished. Null if the installation is not finished yet.

compatible.description: Flag if the backup is compatible with current UNMS version.

discoveryBlacklist.description: IP addresses or subnets blacklisted in Discovery.

migrationModeEnabled.description: When true all new device connections and connected devices will change UNMS Key.

migrationForceModeEnabled.description: When true reachability check will be skipped.

allowUnmsBetaVersion.description: When true UNMS will look for latest UNMS version among beta releases.

maintenanceWindowFriday.description: Allow automatically upgrade firmware in this day.

maintenanceWindowMonday.description: Allow automatically upgrade firmware in this day.

maintenanceWindowSaturday.description: Allow automatically upgrade firmware in this day.

maintenanceWindowSunday.description: Allow automatically upgrade firmware in this day.

maintenanceWindowThursday.description: Allow automatically upgrade firmware in this day.

maintenanceWindowTuesday.description: Allow automatically upgrade firmware in this day.

maintenanceWindowWednesday.description: Allow automatically upgrade firmware in this day.

ucrmId.description: ID of UCRM client bound with this site. Null if no UCRM client is bound to this site.

deletedAt.description: Time when the site was deleted in ISO format.

address.description: Server address, null if hostname cannot be resolved.

date.description: Timestamp in milliseconds when the news was published.

ipAddress.description: Custom IP address in IPv4 or IPv6 format.

field.description: Where in the "data" is the matched string.

position.description: Position in the "value" where the match starts.

newUserRoles.description: Experimental flag for new user roles.

canConfigureSmtp.description: Whether SMTP can be configured or not.

canConfigureMaps.description: Whether map engine is configurable or not.

canDownloadSupportInfo.description: Whether support info can be downloaded or not.

canConfigureCertificate.description: Whether SSL certificate can be configured or not.

canConfigureNetflow.description: Whether netflow can be configured or not.

canConfigureHostname.description: Whether hostname can be configured or not.

canConfigureUcrm.description: Whether CRM can be configured from UNMS UI or not.

canUpdateUnms.description: Whether UNMS can be updated from UNMS UI or not.

canConfigureDeviceProfiles.description: Whether device profiles can be configured or not.

canSetupWithoutAuthentication.description: Whether UNMS setup wizard can be completed without authentication.

canConfigureFirstDeviceInSetup.description: Whether UNMS setup wizard can show the First device screen.

canSkipPrivacyPolicyAgreement.description: Whether UNMS setup can skip privacy policy agreement screen.

canRunLocalDiscovery.description: Whether UNMS can discover devices in local network.

isCloudSmtpAvailable.description: Whether cloud SMTP is available or not.

latestVersionUrl.description: URL to check for new version of UNMS.

useCustomSslCert.description: Whether the server is using custom SSL cert or not.

netflowPort.description: Port where server is listening for netflow packets.

migrationModeEnabled.description: When true all new device connections and connected devices will change UNMS Key.

migrationForceModeEnabled.description: When true reachability check will be skipped.

allowUnmsBetaVersion.description: When true UNMS will look for latest UNMS version among beta releases.

maintenanceWindowFriday.description: Allow automatically upgrade firmware in this day.

maintenanceWindowMonday.description: Allow automatically upgrade firmware in this day.

maintenanceWindowSaturday.description: Allow automatically upgrade firmware in this day.

maintenanceWindowSunday.description: Allow automatically upgrade firmware in this day.

maintenanceWindowThursday.description: Allow automatically upgrade firmware in this day.

maintenanceWindowTuesday.description: Allow automatically upgrade firmware in this day.

maintenanceWindowWednesday.description: Allow automatically upgrade firmware in this day.

sources.description: List of IP addresses that are sending netflow data

NmsUpdateError.description: Error that caused the update to fail. Null if update succeeded or is still running.

message.description: Brief description of the update error.

deployment.description: How was the UNMS deployed. Content of UNMS_DEPLOYMENT env variable.

time.description: Start of the aggregated time interval as a timestamp in milliseconds.

upload.description: Total number of bytes uploaded during interval.

download.description: Total number of bytes downloaded during interval.

siteId.description: ID of the site that generated this traffic.

ipAddress.description: Custom IP address in IPv4 or IPv6 format.

frequencyBands.description: List of frequency bands in [key(freq),value(anze)] format.

ipAddress.description: Custom IP address in IPv4 or IPv6 format.

frequencyBands 1.description: List of frequency bands in [key(freq),value(anze)] format.

cableLength.description: Cable Length from eth0 interface in meters. When below values is null cable is long less then 20m.

cableSnr.description: Average signal-to-noise ratio on eth0 interface in dB

rxCinr.description: Carrier to Interference-plus-Noise Ratio in dB on wireless

ipAddress.description: Custom IP address in IPv4 or IPv6 format.

modelName.description: Full names, for example UFiber OLT.

displayName.description: UNMS device alias or real name.

frequencyBands 2.description: List of frequency bands in [key(freq),value(anze)] format.

frequencyBands 3.description: List of frequency bands in [key(freq),value(anze)] format.

cableLength.description: Cable Length from eth0 interface in meters. When below values is null cable is long less then 20m.

cableSnr.description: Average signal-to-noise ratio on eth0 interface in dB

rxCinr.description: Carrier to Interference-plus-Noise Ratio in dB on wireless

ipAddress.description: Custom IP address in IPv4 or IPv6 format.
Custom IP address in IPv4 or IPv6 format.
Custom IP address in IPv4 or IPv6 format.

enabled.description: Set to true to enable NTP client
Set to true to enable sending syslog to remote logging server.

community.description: User ID or password that allows access to device's statistics.

enabled.description: Respond to UBNT Device Discovery protocol requests. Device must have DISCOVERY_RESPONDER service capability (aka discovery server).
Enable discovery scanner tool. Device must have DISCOVERY_SCANNER tool capability (aka discovery client).

passiveOnly.description: Use only passive discovery protocols (MNDP, CDP and LLDP) and not active protocols (UBNT discovery).

items.description: Custom IP address in IPv4 or IPv6 format.

ipAddress.description: Custom IP address in IPv4 or IPv6 format.

maxMtu.description: Maximum configurable MTU value in bytes.

isCurrentMtuSynced.description: Set to true if all interfaces have the same mtu.

enabled.description: Set to true if jumbo frames are enabled.
Set to true if STP is enabled.

maxAge.description:
Length of time (in seconds) since last BPDU received on this port before aging out the BPDU and
      initiating topology reconvergence.

helloTime.description: Time between each bridge protocol data unit (BPDU) that is sent on a port (in seconds).

version.description: Version of STP: RSTP (802.1w), MSTP (802.1s) or STP (802.1d).

forwardDelay.description: Time spent in listening and learning state (in seconds) prior to entering forwarding state.

dhcpOption82.description: Set to true to allow DHCP option 82

ipV6SlaacEnabled.description: Set to true if Edge Switch has a SLAAC IPv6 address.

postId.description: blog post id in Ubiquiti blog

id.description: ID of the currently active questionnaire. Null if no questionnaire is active.

items.description: Blacklisted address or subnet in cidr format.

ips.description: List of IPs objects in UNMS within the subnet with deviceId and interfaceId.

x.description: Milliseconds elapsed between 1 January 1970 00:00:00 UTC and the given date

y.description: Data point value. null if we do not have any value for given timestamp.

period.description: Number of milliseconds between data points

enabled.description: Set to TRUE if optional Traffic Shaping queue are activated.

propagation.description:
Whether or not set Traffic Shaping on Client devices like, CPEs and ONUs.
      Enabling this will lower your traffic in local network.

downloadBurstSize.description: Amount of bytes that can be sent at downloadSpeed in excess of the guaranteed rate.

uploadBurstSize.description: Amount of bytes that can be sent at uploadSpeed in excess of the guaranteed rate.

aggregation.description:
Number indicating how many times the guaranteed rate is less than the maximum allowed bandwidth.
      Null for auto calculation by UNMS.

time.description: Start of the aggregated time interval as a timestamp in milliseconds

upload.description: Total number of bytes uploaded during interval

download.description: Total number of bytes downloaded during interval

ports 5.description: Configuration or status of ONU's ethernet ports

lanPort.description: Port (or port range) forwarded on target device

wanPort.description: Port (or port range) forwarded on WAN

enabled.description: Set to true if rule is enabled

lanAddress.description: IPv4 address of the target LAN device

dnsResolvers.description: Array of IPv4 addresses of DNS resolvers

dnsProxyEnabled.description: Set to true to enable DNS proxying

wanAddress.description: WAN address of ONU in CIDR format - required if wanMode is set to "static"

pppoeMode.description: PPPoE mode, required if WAN mode set to PPPoE

routerAdvertisementPrefix.description: Static prefix configuration in IPv6 CIDR

wanAddress6.description: WAN address of ONU in CIDR format - required if wanMode6 is set to "static"

downloadLimitEnabled.description: Set to true to enable download bandwidth limit

uploadLimitEnabled.description: Set to true to enable upload bandwidth limit

lanProvisioned.description: Set to true to enable setting LAN from OLT

natFtp.description: Set to true to enable NAT for FTP protocol

natPptp.description: Set to true to enable NAT for PPTP protocol

natRtsp.description: Set to true to enable NAT for RTSP protocol

natSip.description: Set to true to enable NAT for SIP protocol

upnpEnabled.description: Set to true to enable UPnP

firewallEnabled6.description: Set to true to enable IPv6 statefull firewall

isIpv6Enabled.description: Set to true to enable IPv6

enabled.description: Set to true if device is enabled

sshEnabled.description: Set to true if SSH is enabled

telnetEnabled.description: Set to true if Telnet is enabled

ubntDiscoveryEnabled.description: Set to true if UNMS discovery is enabled

provisioned.description: When false, configuration of wireless part can be done directly from ONU only.

enabled.description: Set to true if wireless is enabled

channel.description: Wireless channel, set to 'auto' or number 1-13

country.description: Country for regulatory domain - ISO 3166-2 alpha code or WO for 'World wide'

alias.description: Display name used in UNMS for the device.

maintenance.description: If set to true outages are not reported for the device.

customIpAddress.description: Custom IP address in IPv4 or IPv6 format.

overrideGlobal.description: If TRUE during update of unms global settings this device settings will not update if FALSE then yes.

ap.description: It is set to true when the device is set to be installed as a AP

upload.description: Total number of bytes uploaded during interval

download.description: Total number of bytes downloaded during interval

dynamicLeases.description: Total amount of dynamic leases used.

enabled.description: Set to TRUE to enable DHCP server.

interface.description: Interface IP v4 address in CIDR format.

poolSize.description: Total range of leases in DHCP pool.

rangeEnd.description: DHCP addresses pool end in CIDR format.

rangeStart.description: DHCP addresses pool start in CIDR format.

staticLeases.description: Total amount of static leases used.

expiration.description: expiration date in ISO format (UNMS-420); Nullable string.

rangeStart.description: DHCP addresses pool start in CIDR format.

expiration.description: expiration date in ISO format (UNMS-420); Nullable string.

netflowEnabled.description: Set to true to enable NetFlow.

netflowAlerts.description: Set to true to enable alerts.

qosEnabled.description: Set to true to enable traffic shaping.

suspend.description: Set to true to enable suspend.

forceOverwrite.description: Set to true to force write new NetFlow settings to device over current device's settings.

result.description: config successfully written to device or not

mac1.description: MAC address of the first installation device.

mac2.description: MAC address of the second installation device.

contactPhone.description: Phone number of the contact person.

firmwareForMStationsVersion.description: For accessPoint (AC series) with M stations.

name.description: Human readable name of the token.

id.description: Token ID, not the token itself.

createdAt.description: Time when this token was created.

lastUsed.description: Time when this token was last used. If null then it has not been used yet.

expiresAt.description: Time when this token will expire unless it is renewed. If null than it will never expire.

maxExpiresAt.description: Latest time when the token will expire. If null then it will never expire.

userId.description: Id of the user this token represents. Null if the token is not bound to any user.

transient.description: If true then the token will be deleted when server restarts.

currentSession.description: If true than this token was used in this request.

token.description: The newly created token that can be used in x-auth-token header.

enabled.description: Whether user is allowed to login or not.

isReadOnly.description: If true, access to site is read-only. If false, access to site is read-write.

servicePlanId.description: ID of the CRM Service plan that should be assigned to the new Client

elevation.description: Antenna's elevation in meters, defaults to 10m

heading.description: Antenna's azimuth rotation in rad, max 6.28318. North: 0, East: PI/2, South: PI, West: 3*PI/2.

tilt.description: Antenna's vertical rotation in rad. Straight: 0, Down: -PI/2, Up: PI/2.

roll.description: Antenna's axial rotation in rad. Horizontal: 0, increased by right (clockwise) rotation.

coverage.description: List of modulation values in Mbps.

northWestCorner.description: GPS coordinates North-West corner of the coverage.

southEastCorner.description: GPS coordinates South-East corner of the coverage.

maxCapacity.description: Max capacity of requested configuration in Mbps

macAddresses.description: Device with one of these MAC addresses will be automatically authorised and assigned to defined site/client.

ipAddresses 1.description: Device with one of these IP addresses will be automatically authorised and assigned to defined site/client.

ucrmId.description: In case of client type, ID of UCRM service. In case of site type, ID of UCRM site.

parentSiteUcrmId.description: ID of UCRM parent site of a client. Null if UCRM client has no parent site.

contactPhone.description: Phone number of the contact person.

role.description: Role of this user in UNMS. 'anonymous' if user is only allowed to access CRM.

sessionTimeout.description: Session expiration in milliseconds, max 30 days.

keepMeSignedIn.description: Whether session should be cleared when browser window is closed.

lastNewsSeenDate.description: Last news check time in ISO format.

lastReleaseNotesSeen.description: Last seen version of release notes.

ucrmId.description: ID of UCRM user that is bound with this user.

ucrmRole.description: Role of this user in UCRM. 'null' if user is not allowed to access UCRM.

homeScreen.description: Where should the user be redirected after login.

enabled.description: Whether the user can log in or not.

updated.description: Last time the user was updated.

isSuperAdmin.description: Whether user is UCRM super admin or not.

isActive.description: Whether user is active or not. Inactive users cannot log in.

newUsername.description: New username in case that the original CRM username is already taken in UNMS.

state.description:
State previously sent to SSO.
              Same value must be in nms-sso-login cookie.

expiration.description: expiration date in ISO format (UNMS-420); Nullable string.

interface.description: Interface IP v4 address in CIDR format.

rangeEnd.description: DHCP addresses pool end in CIDR format.

rangeStart.description: DHCP addresses pool start in CIDR format.

interface.description: Interface IP v4 address in CIDR format.

rangeEnd.description: DHCP addresses pool end in CIDR format.

rangeStart.description: DHCP addresses pool start in CIDR format.

expiration.description: expiration date in ISO format (UNMS-420); Nullable string.

keepMeSignedIn.description: Whether session should be cleared when browser window is closed.

role.description: Ignored, user cannot change his own role.

migrationModeEnabled.description: When true all new device connections and connected devices will change UNMS Key.

migrationForceModeEnabled.description: When true reachability check will be skipped.

allowUnmsBetaVersion.description: When true UNMS will look for latest UNMS version among beta releases.

maintenanceWindowFriday.description: Allow automatically upgrade firmware in this day.

maintenanceWindowMonday.description: Allow automatically upgrade firmware in this day.

maintenanceWindowSaturday.description: Allow automatically upgrade firmware in this day.

maintenanceWindowSunday.description: Allow automatically upgrade firmware in this day.

maintenanceWindowThursday.description: Allow automatically upgrade firmware in this day.

maintenanceWindowTuesday.description: Allow automatically upgrade firmware in this day.

maintenanceWindowWednesday.description: Allow automatically upgrade firmware in this day.

updated.description: Time when the site was last updated.

suspended.description: Whether access to internet is disabled for this site or not.

deviceCount.description: Number of devices in this site.

ucrmId.description: ID of UCRM client bound with this site. Null if no UCRM client is bound to this site.

enabled.description: Whether user is allowed to login or not.

alerts.description: Whether to send email alerts or not.

totpAuthEnabled.description: Whether two-factor authentication is enabled or not.

enabled.description: Set to true if a read only user is set

dnsServers 1.description: Array of IP addresses of DNS servers in IPv4 form

clientIsolation.description: Set to true to isolate clients

igmpSnooping.description: Set to true to enable IGMP snooping

accessFromSfp.description: Set to true to allow access from SFP

dhcpOption82.description: Set to true to allow DHCP option 82

ipV6SlaacEnabled.description: Set to true if Edge Switch has a SLAAC IPv6 address.

enabled.description: Set to true if device is enabled
Set to TRUE to enable DHCP server.

interface.description: Interface IP v4 address in CIDR format.

poolSize.description: Total range of leases in DHCP pool.

rangeEnd.description: DHCP addresses pool end in CIDR format.

rangeStart.description: DHCP addresses pool start in CIDR format.

enabled.description: Set to TRUE to enable DHCP server.

interface.description: Interface IP v4 address in CIDR format.

poolSize.description: Total range of leases in DHCP pool.

rangeEnd.description: DHCP addresses pool end in CIDR format.

rangeStart.description: DHCP addresses pool start in CIDR format.

updated.description: Last time the location was updated.

role.description: Role of this user in UNMS. 'anonymous' if user is only allowed to access CRM.

sessionTimeout.description: Session expiration in milliseconds, max 30 days.

keepMeSignedIn.description: Whether session should be cleared when browser window is closed.

lastNewsSeenDate.description: Last news check time in ISO format.

lastReleaseNotesSeen.description: Last seen version of release notes.

ucrmId.description: ID of UCRM user that is bound with this user.

ucrmRole.description: Role of this user in UCRM. 'null' if user is not allowed to access UCRM.

homeScreen.description: Where should the user be redirected after login.

enabled.description: Whether the user can log in or not.

updated.description: Last time the user was updated.

enum: Saint Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunh
South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

displayName.description: UNMS device alias or real name.

ip.description: Custom IP address in IPv4 or IPv6 format.

modelName.description: Full names, for example UFiber OLT.

customIpAddress.description: Custom IP address in IPv4 or IPv6 format.

wirelessActiveInterfaceIds.description: Main active radios currently used to send/receive traffic.

canUpgrade.description: TRUE if device can be upgraded.

frequency.description: Nullable prop; current frequency (only for airmax devices).

isLocateRunning.description: TRUE if device is in location mode.

lastSeen.description: Last seen timestamp in ISO format.

runningOnBattery.description: TRUE if device is running on battery

signal.description: Nullable prop; current signal level (only for airmax devices), for example -55 dBm.

stationsCount.description: Count of stations (only for airmax and aircube).

displayName.description: Computed display name from name and description

address.description: Custom IP address in IPv4 or IPv6 format.

port.description: Properties specific for ports on ES and TS devices.

frequency.description: Frequency in MHz, on which radio is listening.

channelWidth.description: Channel width in MHz radio is operating on.

displayName.description: UNMS device alias or real name.

ip.description: Custom IP address in IPv4 or IPv6 format.

modelName.description: Full names, for example UFiber OLT.

rxChain.description: Wireless signal level in dBm for each antenna chain.

txChain.description: Wireless signal level in dBm for each antenna chain.

ipAddress.description: Custom IP address in IPv4 or IPv6 format.

interfaceId.description: Interface name, where the station is connected.

ipAddress.description: Custom IP address in IPv4 or IPv6 format.

field.description: Where in the "data" is the matched string.

position.description: Position in the "value" where the match starts.

updated.description: Time when the site was last updated.

suspended.description: Whether access to internet is disabled for this site or not.

phone.description: Phone number of the contact person.

updated.description: Time when the site was last updated.

suspended.description: Whether access to internet is disabled for this site or not.

ipAddresses.description: Devices IPs assigned to a site/client site.

deviceCount.description: Number of devices in this site.

ucrmId.description: ID of UCRM client bound with this site. Null if no UCRM client is bound to this site.

Model 4.description: Users who will receive notifications. Notification type must be set to custom.

type.description: What notification system is used by this site.

enabled.description: Set to TRUE if optional Traffic Shaping queue are activated.

propagation.description:
Whether or not set Traffic Shaping on Client devices like, CPEs and ONUs.
      Enabling this will lower your traffic in local network.

downloadBurstSize.description: Amount of bytes that can be sent at downloadSpeed in excess of the guaranteed rate.

uploadBurstSize.description: Amount of bytes that can be sent at uploadSpeed in excess of the guaranteed rate.

aggregation.description:
Number indicating how many times the guaranteed rate is less than the maximum allowed bandwidth.
      Null for auto calculation by UNMS.

activeFrom.description: Time when the service was activated.

tariffId.description: ID of the tariff (service plan) used for this service.

deviceCount.description: Number of devices on this site.

firmwareForMStationsVersion.description: For accessPoint (AC series) with M stations.
For accessPoint (AC series) with M stations.
